column1: Figure 9. Nonfatal firearm violence, by region, 1997–2011
Data source: National Crime Victimization Survey, 1996-2011
Authors: Michael Planty and Jennifer Truman
Figure 9. Nonfatal firearm violence, by region, 1997–2011
Note: Data based on 2-year rolling averages beginning in 1996. Region information was not available from 1993 to 1995. See appendix table 14 for rates and standard errors.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 1996–2011.
